articles.title: Huawei Mate 50 series with HarmonyOS to launch globally in 2022 - HC Newsroom

articles.title: Joe Biden promises the US and allies will act 'decisively' if Russia further invades Ukraine - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: The White House said Mr Biden underscored his commitment that the US won't negotiate policy that impacts Europe without its allies' input
articles.content:
Past military incursions by Mr Putin loom large as Mr Biden weighs his next steps.
